title: Bought Riot Points but didnt get it.
body:
Today i bought Riot Point for that sale thing and i havent  got it now. ( 10â‚¬ paysera]
What should i do?

replies.body: Looking into this, I don't see anything that's gone through.  If it's still pending for you, it may be a bit for it to process.  You can also send us a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team can take a look!  We'll reply asap!
